title: Tintagel
name: Tintagel Castle
hours: Check website for hours as varies throughout year
content: The castle overlooks the rugged North Cornwall coast, offering dramatic views. Tintagel Castle is said to be the birthplace of King Arthur, you can still visit the nearby Merlin's Cave. The castle also features in the tale of Tristan and Isolde. Beach cafe available. Note there is no parking on site. Pay and display parking in the village, 600 metres away.
